description.value: The Sister adds their Insanity Bonus to the damage they inflict with melee attacks on targets they possess appropriate Hatred talents for.

system.benefit: The Sister adds their Insanity Bonus to the damage they inflict with melee attacks on targets they possess appropriate Hatred talents for.

prerequisites.text: Tier 1: Sister of Battle E.Adv, Insanity 10+, Hatred (Any).
